```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(rvest)
```

# PoC

```{r}
job_titles <- c()
skills <- c()
```


```{r}
so_df<- read_html("https://stackoverflow.com/jobs/552731/data-scientist-jpmorgan-chase-bank-na")

job_title <- so_df %>% html_elements("title") %>% html_text()

job_titles <- c(job_titles, job_title)

so_df %>% html_elements(".fw-wrap")

so_df %>% html_elements(".no-tag-menu")

skill_list <- so_df %>% html_elements(".mb32")

skill_list <- skill_list[2] %>% html_elements(".fw-wrap") %>% html_text()

skills <- c(skills, skill_list)
```
